nodes.text: Imitation killcrab was a type of food meant to imitate the meat of a killcrab. The Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs used it as a filling to stuff fungus caps in the dish known as Constable's Caps and at some point after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, he listed it with other possible fillings in his cookbook, The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook.
Imitation killcrab was first mentioned in the 2019 cookbook Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Marc Sumerak and Chelsea Monroe-Cassel.
